WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
On every build, new tsc.exe and conhost.exe are spawned and they don't exit.

Do a few builds and you're greeted with a "Low Memory" warning.
WorkItem.Summary: tsc.exe and conhost.exe not exiting, extra instances with every build

Comments.Message:
Thanks for reporting. 

It looks like you're using Web Essentials, there are a number of known issues with Web Essentials and the latest drops of TypeScript. 

Can you make sure you have the latest version of Web Essentials.

Note; please re-open the bug (button on top) when adding a comment.

** Closed by paulb 08/09/2013 11:24AM
I'm already using the latest version (2.9 released on 4th of August).
I am having the same issue. Web Essentials 2.9 and Typescript 0.9.1.1
I guess this will no longer be an issue with Web Essentials removing all TS support.
